scripts.install: npx playwright install --with-deps && apt-get update && apt-get install -y wget unzip libc6=2.31-13+deb11u6 libnss3 libatk1.0-0 libatk-bridge2.0-0 libcups2 libxcomposite1 libxrandr2 libasound2 libpangocairo-1.0-0 libpango-1.0-0 libgbm1 libxdamage1 libxshmfence1 libegl1 libx11-xcb1 libxfixes3 libxcb-dri3-0 libdrm2 libxrender1
